title: Citi Named Best Flow House and Best Cash Management House in Latin America and Best Investment Bank in Central America and The Caribbean in Euromoney's Awards for Excellence 2013
summary: Miami, Florida - Citi was named Best Cash Management House in Latin America for the fifth consecutive year and Best Flow House in Latin America in the 2013 Euromoney Awards for Excellence. In addition, Citi was named Best Investment Bank in the Caribbean for the fourth consecutive year, Best Investment Bank in Central America, Best Global Emerging Markets Bank, Best Global Emerging Markets Equity House and Best Investment Bank in Peru. Furthermore, Euromoney named Banco de Chile Best Bank in Chile for the third consecutive year and named Banchile Citi Best Debt House in Chile. These awards re-affirm Citi's leadership in this highly competitive field sector of the market.
tag-1: Citi Named Best Flow House and Best Cash Management House in Latin America and Best Investment Bank in Central America and The Caribbean in Euromoney's Awards for Excellence 2013
tag-3: Miami, Florida – Citi was named Best Cash Management House in Latin America for the fifth consecutive year and Best Flow House in Latin America in the 2013 Euromoney Awards for Excellence. In addition, Citi was named Best Investment Bank in the Caribbean for the fourth consecutive year, Best Investment Bank in Central America, Best Global Emerging Markets Bank, Best Global Emerging Markets Equity House and Best Investment Bank in Peru. Furthermore, Euromoney named Banco de Chile Best Bank in Chile for the third consecutive year and named Banchile Citi Best Debt House in Chile. These awards re-affirm Citi's leadership in this highly competitive field sector of the market.
tag-4: The Awards for Excellence 2013 were announced and presented at the Euromoney Awards for Excellence Dinner in London on Thursday, July 11.
tag-5: Francisco Aristeguieta, Citi's CEO for Latin America, said, "We are honored to be recognized by Euromoney. These prestigious awards are only possible thanks to our strong and trust-based relationships with our valued clients, and to our people and their continuous focus on offering unparalleled services and solutions to our clients in each one of the countries where we do business."
tag-6: Combining local presence and expertise in 23 countries in the region, together with global capabilities, Citi provides unsurpassed and consistent products and services to local, regional and global clients in the Latin America region.
tag-7: With more than two decades of history, the Euromoney Awards for Excellence are among the most respected awards in the financial services industry.
tag-9: Citi Citi, the leading global bank, has approximately 200 million customer accounts and does business in more than 160 countries and jurisdictions. Citi provides consumers, corporations, governments and institutions with a broad range of financial products and services, including consumer banking and credit, corporate and investment banking, securities brokerage, transaction services, and wealth management.
